thread.section_title: The Marcel at Gramercy - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel - Review of The Marcel at Gramercy, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tracey S
title: Fantastic hotel
text:
We stayed at this hotel for three nights as part of a 3 stage holiday....the room was a fantastic corner room with views over to the Empire State Building. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful and the room was immaculate. We received a complimentary upgrade as we were there celebrating my 50th birthday - a huge thank you to all the staff for making this a holiday to remember!!
Will definitely return here.
